require(bindata)

h2 <- rmvbin(N, c(p1,p2), bincorr=(1-rho)*diag(2)+rho)

g1 = (h1[,1] + h2[,1])
g2 = (h1[,2] + h2[,2])
h1 <- rmvbin(N, c(p1,p2), bincorr=(1-rho)*diag(2)+rho)

g3 = (h1[,1] + h2[,1])
g4= (h1[,2] + h2[,2])
X = cbind(g1,g2,g3,g4)

    af = ( table(x)[3] * 2 +  table(x)[2]) / (2* length(x))

    X_test[ x == 1] = 1-   2* af
    X_test[ x == 2] = 2-   2* af
